Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-0395 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.35-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-0395 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.35-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glibc is earlier than 2.35-8, affected by CVE-2025-0395
